Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended; resumes early Fri, Jan 5.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Dempster-Skokie, serving all affected stations during regular hours of operation.

Update: Service will resume in the morning on Friday, January 5. (See related alert; press release.)

Allow extra travel time.
